Oh. Hey. Hello. How are you? I'm going to
the park to meet Maggie. But it's raining.

Aha. I know a song that we can sing to the
sun. If you know it, join me. Are you ready?

Mr. Sun sun, hello Mr. Sun. Please shine down
on me. Mr. Sun sun, hello Mr. Sun. Please

shine down on me.
Hey. It worked. Look. It's sunny. Come on.

Let's go and meet Maggie at the park. Yay.
Oh. Look boys and girls, look. What is it?

Yeah. It's a dog. Hey. Let's sing our. Come

you bark for me. Please back for me Mr. Dog.
What color is the dog? Yeah. It's black. It's

a black dog. Say it with me. What is it? It's
a black dog. What is it? It's a black dog.

What is it? It's a black dog. Yeah. Okay.
Bye bye Mr. Dog. Yay. Come on. We're going

to meet Maggie. Oh. Hey look. What is it?
What is it? Yeah. It's a cat. Come on, let's

sing our song.
Mrs. Cat cat, hello Mrs. Cat. Please mnau

for me. Yay. Oh, thank you Mrs. Cat. Yay.
What color is the cat? Yeah. It's grey. It's

cat. What is it? It's a grey cat. Yeah. Thank

Great. We're here at the park. Oh and look.

Come on. Let's sing our song to Mr. Duck.

hou. Great. Hey. What color is the duck? Yeah.
It's white. It's a white duck. So say it with

What is it? It's a white duck. What is it?

It's a white duck. Thank you Mr. Duck.
Oh is that Maggie over there? Come on. Let's

take a closer look. Oh is it Maggie? Is it
Maggie? No. It's not Maggie. It's too small.

So what is it? Yeah. It's a bird. A little
bird. Let's sing our song. Little bird bird,

hello little bird. Please will you ..... for
me. Yay. What color is the little bird? Yeah.

It's blue. It's a blue bird. Say it with me.
What is it? It's a blue bird. What is it?

It's a blue bird. What is it? It's a blue

Oh dear. Well. I'm here at the park, but where
is Maggie? Maggie! Maggie! Maggie! Oh where

is Maggie? Can you see her?
Hello. Maggie. Hi Steve. Hi. Oh. Hello Maggie.

Hello Steve. We have been singing a great
song. Oh. We'll show you. Come on. Let's sing

it for Maggie. Sing hello Maggie. Are you
ready? Hello Maggie Maggie, hello Maggie.

Please will you sing for me?
Oh. Thank you Maggie and thank you boys and
girls.
It's Steve and Maggie.

Oh, hey, hello! Hi. I am trying to play the

Look, it´s a piano. Say it with me. Down
here. We say It´s a piano. And up here. It´s

a piano.
It´s a piano. Come on. It´s a piano.

It´s a piano. It´s a piano.
Maggie: Steve!

Steve: Yes, Maggie?
Maggie. Be quiet! You can´t play the piano.

Steve: Sorry.
Oh, shhhhh. Yeah. I can´t play the piano.

Oh, dear. But, hey…

music. Yeah! Oh no! Oh Steve!
Hey, look! What´s this? Yeah, it´s a guitar.

that´s better. Yeah! Oh dear. It´s getting

Oh, sorry, Maggie.

Really?

Maggie: Yeah!
Great! Ok. So let´s play.

Maggie: Play the drums. Yeah!

Steve: Bye-bye.
Maggie: See you. Yeah!
It's Steve and Maggie.
